ingredients.ingredient: ½ green bell pepper, sliced into thin strips
½ red bell pepper, sliced into thin strips
1 pinch salt and ground black pepper to taste
1 pinch salt and ground black pepper to taste

cookingTips: Slice vegetables uniformly so they cook at the same rate as the sausage
Toss vegetables and sausage halfway through cooking for even browning
Use vegan bratwurst straight from the package; thawing is unnecessary for air frying
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Show me how to slice and arrange the vegetables with the bratwurst for even cooking, then guide me through air frying for caramelized peppers and onions.
